## ProofService.generateProof() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Generate proof from given identity and credential for protocol proof request

**Signature:**

```typescript
generateProof(proofReq: ZeroKnowledgeProofRequest, identifier: DID, credential: W3CCredential, opts?: ProofGenerationOptions): Promise<{
        proof: ZKProof;
        credential: W3CCredential;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  proofReq | [ZeroKnowledgeProofRequest](./polygonid-js-sdk.zeroknowledgeproofrequest.md) | protocol zkp request |
|  identifier | DID | did that will generate proof |
|  credential | [W3CCredential](./polygonid-js-sdk.w3ccredential.md) | credential that will be used for proof generation |
|  opts | [ProofGenerationOptions](./polygonid-js-sdk.proofgenerationoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ options that will be used for proof generation |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ proof: ZKProof; credential: [W3CCredential](./polygonid-js-sdk.w3ccredential.md); }&gt;

`Promise<{ proof: ZKProof; credential: W3CCredential }>`
